programme.desc: When Woof disappears into the magic suitcase, Wally and Wenda launch an international search for their happily wandering puppy. Our favorite Wanderers from around the world return to help our heroes find Woof in this globetrotting adventure.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo are trying to find out who is the funniest animal in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. But they soon realise that they are much funnier when they are together.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Everyone is enjoying playing games on Toy Green but when Noddy and Big Ears come back from apple picking at the farm they discover someone, or something, has broken a key on the xylophone bridge. Noddy needs to investigate! With the help of Bumpy and Revs and using the wwwbook to gather clues, Noddy discovers that someone has tried to fix it with purple sticky tape. If he can find out who uses purple sticky tape he might discover who broke the key. The trail leads him to Smartysaurus, who broke the bridge by mistake when she was playing bowling. Noddy and Deltoid show the big dinosaur how to play the game without breaking anything else. Good job, Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots

programme.desc: When two young men are shot dead, detectives turn to digital forensics, hoping hidden data buried in the victims’ cell phones will help track down the killer.

programme.title: Naked And Afraid (S9)
programme.desc: A survivalist and an outdoorsman take on 21 days in the rugged wilderness of Argentina. But freezing night-time temperatures push the pair to their limits.

programme.title: Opal Hunters Red Dirt Road Trip (S1)
programme.desc: Rod and JC get a painful lesson while mining in the hot and hostile Andamooka. Then, they provide an urgently needed airdrop of supplies to flood-ravaged farmers.

programme.title: Harpoon Hunters (S1)
programme.desc: Captains Joe and Tyler hit bluefin gold. Feeling pressure to live up to his famous father's legacy, strongman Niko changes tactics.

programme.title: Gold Rush (S15)
programme.desc: Parker makes a big call on Dominion Creek's ice-filled ground. Rick buys a new pump to fire up Monster Red.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch (S17)
programme.desc: In the Winter premiere, the fleet reels from the loss of Summer Bay deck boss Nick McGlashan. Wizard and Cornelia launch early into a massive Arctic storm.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch (S17)
programme.desc: Facing a global pandemic, half the fleet is tied up leaving a handful of boats to catch the fleet-wide quota or face closure of the fishery.

programme.title: Naked And Afraid (S9)
programme.desc: For the first time, two series crew members attempt to survive 21 days in front of the camera. They face relentless swarms of insects and a lack of food.

programme.title: Lakefront Bargain Hunt Renovation (S2)
programme.desc: Chris & Jessica have decided to embrace the lake lifestyle and purchase a boat. Can they turn a fixer upper into the retreat of their dreams?

programme.title: Pool Kings (S8)
programme.desc: A family enhances their spectacular mountain view with a breathtaking pool featuring an infinity edge, outdoor kitchen and firepit.

programme.title: Pool Kings (S8)
programme.desc: After living with a broken pool for four years, a family decides to build their dream pool again.

programme.title: Gold Rush (S15)
programme.desc: Rick risks flooding Rally Valley to haul in big gold nuggets. Plus, Kevin's biggest machine goes down while another lights on fire.

programme.title: Harpoon Hunters (S1)
programme.desc: Captain Joe takes his sons to sea aboard the Redrum, only to witness nature at its rawest. Niko hunts the season's biggest bluefin yet, worth $10,000.

programme.title: Dali & Cocky Prince
programme.desc: Price was never a concern for Dali, who was born rich. However, in an overnight, she is left with nothing due to her father's sudden death and bankruptcy. In front of Dali, who is struggling to save the museum that her father wanted to protect until the end, a man shows up, demanding her to pay off a debt of $2,000,000. And that man is Muhak, whom she mistakenly believed to be a big hand in the art world while she was working as a researcher in the Netherlands.

programme.title: The Seasons
programme.desc: On a Friday night when a week starts and end, a talk show brings you music and stories that will "get rid of all your worries and all your concerns."

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: The Return of Superman
programme.desc: Parenting challenges of "Superman,” the first hero that children encounter when they are born.

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles
programme.desc: Foreigners, leaving their homelands behind, have come all the way to new country, South Korea. They chose South Korea not for sightseeing or short-term stay. But, they are here for various reasons, such as work, study or even marriage. The real stories of foreigners who challenge themselves to survive in Korean society will be unfolded!

programme.title: For Eagle Brothers
programme.desc: A family story about five brothers and a sister-in-law who suddenly became the head of the family after her husband's unexpected death.

programme.title: Moving Voices
programme.desc: A global music trip to experience the music and the culture of various countries.

programme.title: My Only One
programme.desc: A woman's life gets twisted one day because of her biological father who shows up after 28 years of absence. He had been thoroughly hiding his identity, afraid that he might be an obstacle in his daughter's life. The father and daughter meet the "only ones" in their lives and put back together the pieces of their broken hearts.

programme.title: Secret Reunion
programme.desc: Ji Won, a North Korean spy, is on a mission to assassinate a defector. South Korean intelligence agent Han Gyu discovers the plot and attempts to arrest him but fails. Six years later, they cross paths again and maintain a tense relationship, but an unusual friendship also blossoms.

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Dachimawa Lee: Gangnam Spy
programme.desc: Legendary Korean spy Dachimawa Lee is assigned to recover the stolen national treasure, a Golden Buddha, and reveal the dark plot. However, his mission ends in failure and Agent Lee must now face off the mysterious mastermind on the snowy slopes of Switzerland, where the statue is believed to be hidden.

programme.title: RUTE:Toughness Redefined
programme.desc: The growing regional competition R U Tough Enough is searching for the toughest person from Southeast Asia. Join the search and meet some of the most mentally and physically strong individuals, leading up to an epic final showdown in Kuala Lumpur for the prize of US$15,000!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Squad 2
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean military survival show brings eight Special Force units together to compete in extreme missions that will test their physical stamina, mental strength and teamwork. Top male reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle till the end in front of five celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Dr. X On The Air
programme.desc: Joe de Lirio (Leo Martinez) is a sexiologist, but he is better known as a radio personality. In his raunchy but highly rated radio program, "Dr. X" he gives out advice to sexually troubled women. But just as Joe is gaining a loyal following among wives, he too is earning the ire of husbands.

programme.title: The Waltons S1 E07 - The Sinner
programme.desc: From the Great Depression to World War II, an American family living in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia struggles to remain together in this heartwarming series, the winner of 13 Emmy Awards, that chronicles the lives of a people poor in material wealth but rich in spirit.

programme.title: CSI S3 E12 - Got Murder?
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.title: Columbo S6 E04 - Try And Catch Me
programme.desc: Los Angeles homicide detective Lieutenant Columbo uses his humble ways and ingenuous demeanor to winkle out even the most well-concealed of crimes.However, beneath all that comical exterior was probably the most dogged investigator in the Los Angeles Police Department.

programme.title: Married With Children S1 E11 - Where's The Boss?

programme.title: CSI S3 E12 - Got Murder?
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.desc: From the Great Depression to World War II, an American family living in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia struggles to remain together in this heartwarming series, the winner of 13 Emmy Awards, that chronicles the lives of a people poor in material wealth but rich in spirit.

programme.title: ALF S1 E06 - For Your Eyes Only

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S2)

programme.title: Beauty and the Best (Concert)
programme.desc: Nostalgia fills the air as the talented Bhen Rosas joins veteran singers Rico J. Puno and Hajji Alejandro in an evening of beautiful music in BEAUTY AND THE BEST

programme.title: Dahil Tanging Ikaw
programme.desc: Erika and Cecil are twins who were separated by poverty right after they were born. Each of them was caught up in her own existence, not knowing that somewhere not so far lived a twin. But one day, fate found a clever way to bring them back together.

programme.title: Isla 2
programme.desc: Celso Ad Castillo once again directs with newcomer Via Veloso in the title role of Isla, the young girl who will do anything just to be able to escape her lustful adoptive father and the desolate island where she might spend her entire life.

programme.title: Apat na Anak ni Adan
programme.desc: This movie centers on the relationship among four brothers and their collective exploits.

programme.title: Maruja
programme.desc: The classic love story by Mars Ravelo came to life again on the motion picture screen. Maruja, the daughter of a rich landowner and Gabriel, the illegitimate son of a Spanish friar, first fell in love a hundred years ago.

programme.title: Paano Tatakasan Ang Bukas?
programme.desc: Desiree and Gilbert are in love but no one seems to believe it.

programme.title: Brando Bandido
programme.desc: Would it be really a surprise if the enigmatic avenger "Brando Bandido" (Andy Poe) is actually Zardo's son, all grown-up and ready to get back at his father's killers?

programme.title: Oplan Baleleng
programme.desc: Oplan Baleleng was the name given to a paramilitary group made up of hardened convicts tasked with the rescue of kidnap for ransom victims. In truth though, theirs was a murder mission.

programme.title: Mauna Ka... Susunod Ako!
programme.desc: When Gerry's father Eric dies in the hands of criminal elements, he goes to his father's bestfriend Arthur for guidance.

programme.title: Iligpit si Bobby Ortega, Markang Bungo 2
programme.desc: More of the real-life exploits of the living legend, Col. Bobby Ortega, the military officer whose unorthodox ways of dealing with the lawless continue to sow fear in the hearts of criminals.

programme.title: Hulihin Si Nardong Toothpick
programme.desc: Nardo was a simple student cum bank janitor who was accidentally accused of murder and robbery. The truth was, while he really intended to rob the victim, he had a change of heart.

programme.title: Tropang Bulilit
programme.desc: Ric Rodrigo dies and he leaves his five children orphaned. The siblings miss each other so much they escape from their new homes and try their luck in Manila. As the kids go on one misadventure to another, their uncle, Lloyd Samartino is going out of his mind looking for them.

programme.title: Walang Karugtong Ang Nakaraan
programme.desc: A widower found a strong resemblance between his late wife and the tutor of his daughter. Naive and very much in love, she obeyed his wishes and only later realized that he was not really in love with her but only with a memory.

programme.title: BOSAI
programme.desc: Find out about Japan's emergency food options that meet the needs of various people. Also discover the rolling stock method, a smart way to stockpile emergency food.

programme.title: Magical Japanese "Tea"

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: The Kawanishi Dainenbutsu Kenbai dance tells the story of restless souls being guided to the Pure Land by the Buddha, in the form of a monkey. In 2022, it became UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage.

programme.title: Masterpieces of Historic Capitals

programme.title: Nun's Cookbook
programme.desc: The nuns of Otowasan Kannonji Temple show us how to make shiba-zuke pickles. Cucumbers, myoga, and a little bit of ume vinegar make the perfect side dish to go with newly harvested rice.

programme.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
programme.desc: Arabian wolves live in the Negev Desert in Israel. How and why do they live in such extreme arid lands? We follow this unique canine for an extended period for the first time ever.

programme.title: Herbal Symphony #1 Spring
programme.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

programme.title: 1/156: Transgenders
programme.desc: 1 in 156 Japanese are transgenders. In a society still lacking in understanding, we talk to transgender people about work, marriage, leisure, as they try to live their normal daily lives.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history. Today: Dewa Sanzan, Mystic Mountains of Prayers.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: My Street Piano
programme.desc: Hiroshima recently hosted the G7 Summit. A piano sits in an underground shopping area near the famous Atomic Bomb Dome, and players from all walks of life stop by to share their favorite melodies.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: On New Year's Eve, families in northeast Japan are visited by monster-like figures called namahage. We follow a group of men trying to keep up their proud tradition as the local population dwindles.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: The Kawanishi Dainenbutsu Kenbai dance tells the story of restless souls being guided to the Pure Land by the Buddha, in the form of a monkey. In 2022, it became UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage.

programme.title: Masterpieces of Historic Capitals
programme.desc: Historic capitals in the Kansai region are home to a wealth of national treasures and masterpieces. In Nara, we delve into astonishing Buddhist and Shinto art.

programme.title: Nun's Cookbook
programme.desc: The nuns of Otowasan Kannonji Temple show us how to make shiba-zuke pickles. Cucumbers, myoga, and a little bit of ume vinegar make the perfect side dish to go with newly harvested rice.

programme.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
programme.desc: Arabian wolves live in the Negev Desert in Israel. How and why do they live in such extreme arid lands? We follow this unique canine for an extended period for the first time ever.

programme.title: Time-lapse Journey
programme.desc: Oze National Park contains the largest mountain wetland in Japan. See the beauty of Oze as time-lapse photography makes the flowers and the morning dew come alive.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CINEMATIC JOURNEY
programme.desc: Kyle Card hikes along the 1000km trail following the Pacific Coast in northern Japanwhere he discovers local lifestyles, stunning nature, traces of the area's 2011 disaster, and resilient people.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: On this episode, we meet Vietnamese Nguyen Quoc Dam who works as a nurse in Kashiwa, Chiba Prefecture, as well as Australian William Rhodes, a garbage collector in Musashino, Tokyo.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Herbal Symphony #1 Spring
programme.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode features ukiyo-e artist Sharaku's "The Actor Ichikawa Ebizo as Takemura Sadanoshin."

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Furuta Takayuki co-developed an intelligent mobility robot that won a prestigious international design award in 2021. He shares his passion for creating robots that help people.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: The highlight of Onabare is nerikomi, which involves the careful wielding of a long, heavy pole. This follows the parade of a portable shrine through the streets with performances along the way.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Gataine Odori is a dance that depicts exhausting land reclamation work carried out in Omuta in the 19th century. A group of elderly women teach the dance to schoolchildren, and keep the story alive.

programme.title: Nun's Cookbook
programme.desc: The nuns of Otowasan Kannonji Temple teach us how to make gohei-mochi rice cakes. Wrap rice around cedar sticks and grill over charcoal. Spread homemade miso and enjoy the savory taste of autumn.

programme.title: Magical Japanese "Tea"
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to tea. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: Bara Kyoushitsu in Kani City, Gifu Prefecture, is a preschool designed to eliminate the number of foreign children who stop attending school because they don't understand Japanese.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: We show how NHK WORLD-JAPAN's app now provides disaster alerts in 11 languages, including push notifications for earthquakes, tsunamis, and severe weather.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Treasure Box Japan: Osaka
programme.desc: Famed for the speed and power of its float pulling, the Kishiwada Danjiri Festival is a dynamic spectacle. This episode highlights the two-day festival and the passion of those involved.

programme.title: Trails to Oishii Tokyo mini
programme.desc: Our focus this time is wasabi. Visit a culturally significant paddy field, try a unique grater that offers stronger pungency, and learn more about the cultivation history of Japan's fiery root.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history. Today: Dewa Sanzan, Mystic Mountains of Prayers.

programme.title: CINEMATIC JOURNEY
programme.desc: Kyle Card hikes along the 1000km trail following the Pacific Coast in northern Japanwhere he discovers local lifestyles, stunning nature, traces of the area's 2011 disaster, and resilient people.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: A depression treatment called rTMS is showing promise. It uses magnetic fields to stimulate the brain and may also help to prevent a relapse when combined with antidepressants.

programme.title: My Street Piano

programme.desc: When a burgling buccaneer steals every pillow in Axle City, it's up to Special Mission Blaze to save bedtime! Using his new Special Mission Modes and the power of addition, can Blaze solve this pillow problem?

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them. // Water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the PAW Patrol find out what's happening!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Goodway and Farmer Al are ready for a day filled with Skydiving fun, but their adventure is quickly derailed. It's Paw Patrol to the rescue! // Alex and the Mini Patrol get locked inside the flounder, the Paw Patrol dives in to save the day!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze. // Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: The Browns are off to the beach for their holiday and meet Shantee the lighthouse keeper when they arrive. // Paddington, Jonathan and Judy become trainee lifeguards and end up rescuing Mr Brown with Taylor the lifeguard's help.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Mayor Greatway asks Rubble & Crew to build something special for her friend Mr. Ducky-Doo. But soon a construction mystery is afoot... // Rubble & Crew work to build a rain tank for Farmer Zoe before a storm, until a chicken complication crops up.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Big Red Chicken's magic goes wonky and not only shrinks himself, but causes wacky things to happen throughout the rainforest. Dora has to fix it! // Bip Bip has a concert with Tico, but he's lost! Dora and Boots have to get him to the show on time.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When a big stunt goes awry, Darington is sent flying away on an out-of-control balloon! Now, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Darington's sidekick Stunt Kitty to save the day!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Chef and Olly make French onion dip, but Chef can't stop crying from the onions! // When the Queen Bee comes to a Stump tea party, Chef's determined to put on a party fit for a queen.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Sharkdog has fleas! Sea fleas, that is. Max will do whatever it takes to get rid of them, but that may be tough because Sharkdog is so itchy, he can't sit still!

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Sharkdog must go on a wild search around town to help Mia find her missing binky and get the baby back to sleep.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Dad's cool boss comes over for dinner, Max and Sharkdog both try to impress him. And they'll do whatever it takes.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: Vola, Goldie, Chucks, and Hank feel left out when they learn that Baby and William have been keeping a super secret. // To prepare for their first big TV interview, Fishy Force trains to be just like their favorite comic book heroes.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick?

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger drops off a ‘gift’ to Mayor Goodway, a flower that spreads a horrible stink when it blooms. // Mayor Goodway tries to return it to him, but runs into trouble and has to be rescued by the Paw Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The Pups must save Rocky and Humdinger from a runaway box fort.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora and Boots have to wake up the Big Red Chicken before he floats over a waterfall! // Dora and friends must solve a series of questions and challenges to open a mysterious gift.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Young François witnesses the birth of Barbapapa. // Barbapapa is a prisoner in a zoo.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: ABC News Overnight - Episode 36
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch - Episode 13
programme.desc: James Glenday, Bridget Brennan, Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne hear from some of the guests who have appeared on News Breakfast. Plus our film critic Zak Hepburn and resident foodie Alice Zaslavsky.

programme.title: Culture By Design - Episode 3
programme.desc: Featuring ceramists, street artists, fashion designers, architects, furniture makers, weavers and more; this series explores universal appeal of 'good design' across Asia. Hosted by Australian design expert, Anthony Burke.

programme.title: I Was Actually There - Nicky Winmar's Stand Against Racism
programme.desc: It's a day etched into Australian sporting folklore for all the wrong reasons. A moment on a footy field where Nicky Winmar, a proud Noongar man, called out racism.

programme.title: Australia: An Unofficial History - Cracks in the Facade
programme.desc: Explores films from the 1970s to tell the story of Australia as never seen before.

programme.title: On Country Kitchen - Episode 1
programme.desc: It's season 2 and Derek still can't cook! With locally found ingredients, and a sprinkle of culture and character, Mark and Derek create an Indigenous-inspired feast for the people they visit along their journey.

programme.title: Paradise Kitchen Bali - Episode 6
programme.desc: Indulge in the versatile world of bananas as Lauren skillfully crafts recipes from banana flour, sourdough bread to pancakes offering a tantalizing experience that showcases the endless possibilities of this humble fruit.

programme.title: Landline - Episode 12
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Offsiders - Magic Round Special
programme.desc: Host Abbey Gelmi and a panel of leading sportswriters, commentators and athletes examine the big issues and major results in sport. Offsiders unpacks all the action, both on and off the field.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - Episode 11
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: News Breakfast - Episode 89
programme.desc: Start your day with the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. James Glenday and Bridget Brennan bring you news and interviews joined by Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 89
programme.desc: When you need to know what's going on in the morning, turn to Gemma Veness for up to the minute news and events as they unfold. Plus the latest in politics, business, sport with Catherine Murphy and weather with Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 89
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.desc: Host Anthony Burke meets a couple turning a neglected inner-city Queenslander into a period showcase and eco-friendly, healthy haven as one partner recovers from cancer.

programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to experts on issues driving the news cycle in an election year.

programme.title: Shutter
programme.desc: A newly married couple discovers disturbing, ghostly images in photographs they develop after an eerie accident in which they believe they may have hit a young girl with their car.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
programme.desc: Two buddies-one blind, the other deaf-go on the run to solve a murder and clear their names.

programme.title: Days Of Thunder
programme.desc: A hotshot stock car racer finds more than fame in the south - love for a neurosurgeon who has a marked disdain for racing.

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
programme.desc: There comes a time in every adolescent's life when he must fake out his parents and blow off a day of school. This is Ferris Bueller's day. A grandmaster in the game of adult manipulation.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
programme.desc: Two buddies-one blind, the other deaf-go on the run to solve a murder and clear their names.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
programme.desc: A typical married couple a little bored with their relationship come to discover that they are enemy assassins hired to kill each other.

programme.title: Heat
programme.desc: A hardened expert thief plans one last heist, but the cop on the case is obsessed with bringing him down.

programme.title: The Ghost And The Darkness
programme.desc: A bridge engineer and an experienced old hunter begin a hunt for two lions after they start attacking local construction workers.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
programme.desc: Two buddies-one blind, the other deaf-go on the run to solve a murder and clear their names.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: Before Holly’s husband died, he made plans for her. Over the course of the year after his death, she will receive letters, gifts, and instructions on how to be happy again.

programme.title: Miss Potter
programme.desc: Biography of children's author Beatrix Potter, including how she overcame a domineering mother and the chauvinism of Victorian England to become a best-selling author.

programme.title: Karikal Mahal: A Silent Witness
programme.desc: The story of a mysterious mansion, Karikal Mahal in early 1900s Singapore that looked like a palace with its lake, fountains and bungalows on sprawling grounds the size of two-and-a-half football fields.

programme.title: IBLIS
programme.desc: A husband buys a new house for his wife, hoping to reconcile their marriage. When they move in however, the couple start to experience insanely terrifying incidents with the presence of a horrifying creature in the house…

programme.title: Death of a Girlfriend
programme.desc: When Christine was found brutally murdered in the woods, her boyfriend, a forest ranger and a farmer are summoned to an inquest. Each suspect has his version to tell, but as the investigation progresses, a dark secret is uncovered, which would reveal the real murderer.

programme.title: Get in the Dark
programme.desc: A reporter hears three horror stories when investigating a case of the paper doll spirit 20 years ago. Miss Qiao had died in vain then, and her butler paid a paper craftsman to make a paper doll to be buried with her. Miss Qiao’s spirit is revived to take revenge when the doll’s eyes are drawn, and a series of horrible events begins to happen...

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: A series of strange events is happening in a peaceful village, including a corpse that is resurrected from its grave and ran away. As the villagers investigate, a villain dies and the village head also goes missing. Police investigation ensues, but as the truths start to unveil, more mysteries are unfolding. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: Hollow
programme.desc: Beth, an old woman with early signs of Alzheimer’s disease, moves in to a new house with her daughter’s family. Despite her loss of reality and worsening symptoms, Beth uncovers something sinister observing her every move. A dark and horrific confrontation is about to begin…

programme.title: The Ones You Didn't Burn
programme.desc: After their father's death, Nathan and his sister return to their family home to prepare it for sale. While there, Nathan discovers that the land was stolen from the ancestors of two women accused of witchcraft. As he delves deeper, he uncovers an occult conspiracy linked to their father's death which now threatens them both.

programme.title: Jacqueline Comes Home: The Chiong Story
programme.desc: Based on a true crime that happened in 1997, the story is about an unknown assailant kidnapping two sisters, Jacqueline and Marijoy Chiong. This is one of the most shocking cases of rape and murder in Philippines history.

programme.title: The Fox Demon Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a story in the novel “Strange Tales from Liaozhai”, a young student in the late Ming Dynasty meets a charming fox demon and they soon fall in love. Though they encounter several obstacles due to their different nature, the lovers continue to fight against fate. Can they finally be together?

programme.desc: An undercover NYPD officer and an ATF special agent learn firsthand not to trust a suspect's demeanour, regardless of how amicable it may appear.

programme.desc: Kelsey's family knew something was amiss when their usually responsible and responsive daughter didn't respond to their texts while out running an errand.

programme.title: Rendez-Vous Au Parc
programme.desc: The idyllic Calanca valley, in the Grisons, a few kilometres from Ticino, is a unique setting. The presence of traditional colonies, surrounded by woods and rural landscapes, contributes to the wild character of the valley. Rich in biodiversity and easily accessible, Val Calanca welcomes nature lovers.

programme.title: Des Racines & Des Ailes
programme.desc: Exploring the city of Quebec, all the way to the Saguenay Fjords National Park, in deep mid-winter then in autumn as the forest dons its most vibrant colours. With historian and photographer Pierre Lahoud, we fly over the icebound Saint Lawrence, one of the world's most dangerous navigable waterways.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Ramón Mercader, Sur Les Pas De Celui Qui A Tué Trotsky
programme.desc: Mexico, 20 August 1940. Ramón Mercader assassinated Leon Trotsky. Who was he? Why did he do it? A Communist activist who came to the notice of the KGB during the Spanish Civil War, the enigmatic Mercader constantly disappeared, gradually moving closer to his victim. He never admitted his true identity.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Les Rois De La Comédie : Fernandel, Jacques Tati, Bourvil, Louis De Funès
programme.desc: A look back at the filmography of French comedy four icons. Fernandel, Jacques Tati, Bourvil and Louis de Funès all met success, simultaneously, at the end of the 1950s, in front of or behind the camera. How did they become box-office stars? What was life like being so immensely popular?

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes
programme.desc: Between the purchase of raw materials and the resale of processed products to consumers, traffickers in marijuana, cocaine, heroin, fentanyl and amphetamines make colossal profits. Morocco, Afghanistan, Colombia, Mexico, Albania: a close-up look at the drug economy and the havoc it wreaks along the way.

programme.title: Frontière Verte
programme.desc: Exploring the edge of the boreal forest, where the Arctic, alpine regions and ocean meet. This project is led by Karine Genest. The explorer is intrigued by the overlapping of species and their capacity to survive. With scientists and guides, she discovers the secrets of the wild.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Merci Professeur !
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Prévoir L'Imprévisible
programme.desc: Society is slowly but surely coming to an end. At least, this is what collapsologists, people who believe in the theory of global and systemic collapse, are predicting. What is the situation in Canada? We meet some of them who are leaving cities, engaging in activism, cultivating their gardens...

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: They are invisible but essential: the dockworkers moor and undock all the merchant ships that enter and leave the ports. Sailors on land, they live on the watch, just like on a ship. In an increasingly automated world, they are an essential link in global maritime trade.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: La Belle Vie
programme.desc: Julien meets Joanie and Hugues, two former members of the armed forces, just a few days be-fore they set sail for the southern seas. Aboard their catamaran, they plan to spend five years seeking out the finest kitesurfing spots around the globe.

programme.title: Libération(S), Dans La Joie Et La Douleur
programme.desc: Summer 1944. After the Landing, the hardest part remains for the Allies and the French traumatized by the German occupation. The liberation of the territory is long. For a year, each region, each city, and each village experience their own liberation. Intimate accounts by those who lived through this period.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: Papilles
programme.desc: Just a stone's throw from the legendary Paul Ricard racetrack, we meet a surprising young man in a rush, Fabien Ferré, who won three Michelin stars at once, becoming France's youngest three-star chef. Combining seriousness and fun, rigour and relaxation, Fabien Ferré offers virtuoso Provence-style cuisine.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.desc: Julien meets Joanie and Hugues, two former members of the armed forces, just a few days be-fore they set sail for the southern seas. Aboard their catamaran, they plan to spend five years seeking out the finest kitesurfing spots around the globe.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Api !
programme.desc: To win back her friends, Api decides to take matters into her own hands. She talks to Koro, who is willing to help her.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux
programme.desc: Alix becomes Chief's apprentice for his new project, making a chest of drawers to store his spare uniform. Finding the plank tree completely bare, Alix teaches him that you can also make planks by cutting down trees.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'Enquête, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.desc: Armand is kept on his toes by his pharmacy and his passion for magic. When his grandmother passes away, he is rapidly overwhelmed.
